price: 65. Ha calaacalina maanta! Hubaal idinku xaggayaga laydiin kama gargaaro’e.
arabic: لَا تَجۡـَٔرُواْ ٱلۡيَوۡمَۖ إِنَّكُم مِّنَّا لَا تُنصَرُونَ

version.title: Somali translation - Jacob
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the Somali language, translated by Abdullah Hasan Jacob.

meta.transliteration: lā tajarū al-yawma innakum minnā lā tunṣarūna
